panels.description: Rate of Go panic errors produced by Loki
panels.title: Internal Panics (rate)

panels.description: Rate of log messages produced by Loki itself
panels.title: Internal Log Messages (rate)

panels.description:
Each row corresponds to the size of ingested log lines.
Hover over the cells to see the exact bucket: logs whose size fits in that bucket will be counted there.
panels.title: # of Ingested Logs (by size)

panels.description: Each time series shows the 95th-percentile (the maximum latency for *most* requests)
panels.title: Requests Latency

panels.description: Each time series shows the 95th-percentile (the maximum latency for *most* requests)
panels.title: Ingester Requests Latency

panels.description: Number of in-progress requests on the read path.
panels.title: # of Inflight Requests (read)

panels.description: Number of in-progress requests on the write path.
panels.title: # of Inflight Requests (write)

panels.description: Number of in-progress requests on the backend path.
panels.title: # of Inflight Requests (backend)

panels.description: Current number of clients connected to query-frontend.
panels.title: # of active readers

panels.description:
Distribution of bytes processed per second for LogQL queries. It shows no data if nothing is reading from Loki.

Each time series shows the 95th-percentile (the maximum data rate for *most* queries)
panels.title: Queried Logs

panels.description:
Time spent in serving index query requests. It shows no data if nothing is reading from Loki.

Each time series shows the 95th-percentile (the maximum data rate for *most* queries)
panels.title: Index Query Requests

panels.description: Each time series shows the 95th-percentile (the maximum latency for *most* requests)
panels.title: Query Latency

panels.description:
Distribution of the chunks download latency.

Each time series shows the 95th-percentile (the maximum latency for *most* requests)
panels.title: Query Latency (chunks)

panels.description: Log lines per second received for each tenant.
panels.title: Log lines / sec (per tenant)
Batch appends sent to ingesters / sec

options.content:
The **Write Ahead Log** (WAL) records incoming data and stores it temporarily in memory. 

In the event of a crash, data will be recovered from the WAL.

panels.description: The rate of failures caused by a full disk.
panels.title: WAL write failures

panels.description: The time of the last compaction executed since the workload was last restarted
panels.title: Last Compaction (from restart)

panels.description: Total rate of tables compaction by status
panels.title: Compactions (rate)

panels.description: The time of the last successful retention run since the workload was last restarted
panels.title: Last Retention (from restart)
